alert.note: Alert for Northeast Mountains; Okanogan Highlands; Okanogan Valley; Western Okanogan County (Washington) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Spokane (Eastern Washington and Northern Idaho)
info.headline: Wind Advisory issued April 03 at 12:04PM PDT until April 04 at 11:00PM PDT by NWS Spokane
info.description: ...WIND ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 8 AM TO 11 PM PDT MONDAY... * WHAT...Southwest winds 15 to 25 mph with gusts of 40 to 50 mph expected. * WHERE...Porthill, Elk, Chewelah, Loomis, Brewster, Methow, Rathdrum, Republic, Danville, Naples, Coolin, Eastport, Colville, Arden, Newman Lake, Bonners Ferry, Clayton, Okanogan, Oroville, Kettle Falls, Sandpoint, Wauconda, Bridgeport, Monse, Omak, Molson, Malo, Malott, Newport, Mazama, Conconully, Priest River, Winthrop, Curlew, Nighthawk, Carlton, Nespelem, Twisp, Orin, Chesaw, Deer Park, and Inchelium. * WHEN...From 8 AM to 11 PM PDT Monday. * IMPACTS...Gusty winds will blow around unsecured objects. Tree limbs could be blown down and a few power outages may result.
info.instruction: Winds this strong can make driving difficult, especially for high profile vehicles. Use extra caution.

area.areaDesc: Northeast Mountains; Okanogan Highlands; Okanogan Valley; Western Okanogan County
